name: The King of Fighters 2006
description:
The King of Fighters 2006 is an arcade-fighting game developed by SNK. It came out on 28-04-2006. SNK published the game.
You can play The King of Fighters 2006 on PlayStation 2.
Falcoon produced the game. Masahiro Maeda directed the game. Toshikazu Tanaka scored the game.
